verses.verse: And he said <S%H559><s%> to me, Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> on your feet, <S%H7272><s%> and I will speak <S%H1696><s%> to you.

And the spirit <S%H7307><s%> entered <S%H935><s%> into me when <S%H834><s%> he spoke <S%H1696><s%> to me, and set <S%H5975><s%> me on my feet, <S%H7272><s%> that I heard <S%H8085><s%> him that spoke <S%H1696><s%> to me.

And he said <S%H559><s%> to me, Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> I send <S%H7971><s%> you to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> to a rebellious <S%H4775><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> that has rebelled <S%H4775><s%> against me: they and their fathers <S%H1><s%> have transgressed <S%H6586><s%> against me, even to this <S%H2088><s%> very <S%H6106><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

For they are impudent <S%H7186><s%> <S%H6440><s%> children <S%H1121><s%> and stiff hearted. <S%H2389><s%> <S%H3820><s%> I do send <S%H7971><s%> you to them; and you shall say <S%H559><s%> to them, Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>

And they, whether <S%H518><s%> they will hear, <S%H8085><s%> or whether <S%H518><s%> they will forbear, <S%H2308><s%> (for they are a rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%>) yet shall know <S%H3045><s%> that there has been <S%H1961><s%> a prophet <S%H5030><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them.

And you, son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> be not afraid <S%H3372><s%> of them, neither <S%H408><s%> be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of their words, <S%H1697><s%> though <S%H3588><s%> briers <S%H5621><s%> and thorns <S%H5544><s%> be with you, and you do dwell <S%H3427><s%> among <S%H413><s%> scorpions: <S%H6137><s%> be not afraid <S%H3372><s%> of their words, <S%H1697><s%> nor <S%H408><s%> be dismayed <S%H2865><s%> at their looks, <S%H6440><s%> though <S%H3588><s%> they be a rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house.

And you shall speak <S%H1696><s%> my words <S%H1697><s%> to them, whether <S%H518><s%> they will hear, <S%H8085><s%> or whether <S%H518><s%> they will forbear: <S%H2308><s%> for they are most rebellious. <S%H4805><s%>

But you, son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> what <S%H853><s%> <S%H834><s%> I say <S%H1696><s%> to you; Be not you rebellious <S%H4805><s%> like that rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house: <S%H1004><s%> open <S%H6475><s%> your mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and eat <S%H398><s%> that I give <S%H5414><s%> you.
And when I looked, <S%H7200><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> an hand <S%H3027><s%> was sent <S%H7971><s%> to me; and, see, <S%H2009><s%> a roll <S%H4040><s%> of a book <S%H5612><s%> was therein;

And he spread <S%H6566><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> me; and it was written <S%H3789><s%> within <S%H6440><s%> and without: <S%H268><s%> and there was written <S%H3789><s%> therein <S%H413><s%> lamentations, <S%H7015><s%> and mourning, <S%H1899><s%> and woe. <S%H1958><s%>
